careerFields.name: Command
careerFields.description: Those in the command field are leaders in their fields and are responsible for directing and applying strategy and policy.

careerFields.name: Tactical
careerFields.description: Tacticians provide guidance and development of plans for exerting our will to transform adversarial space.

careerFields.name: Engineering
careerFields.description: Coils, Antimatter Containment, Warp Drive. I'm giving her all she's got! Engineers design and implement technical solutions to solve the challenges facing the fleet.

careerFields.name: Operations
careerFields.description: Operators execute tactical plans with the tools built from engineering.

careerFields.name: Science
careerFields.description: The Science career field is the Research & Development arm of The Space Force.

careerFields.name: Communications
careerFields.description: Comms people are responsible for connecting both internal members and external partners through social and professional media.

careerFields.name: Intelligence
careerFields.description: Intel Operatives investigate and profile adversaries' positions.

careerFields.name: Diplomatic
careerFields.description: A Space Force diplomat is responsible for achieving understanding among our allies and adversaries alike.

careerFields.name: Marine
careerFields.description: Marines are jack/master of all trades and are deployed in cyber and space to affect change.
